question: i had a dream that i was wearing a very big encompassing head scarf, that almost covered the whole of my body.
answer:
QUESTION
I recently got married. A few days after ... (ref ques). The scarf was plain and made of a very good quality cotton material and it was a beautiful green color. What does my dream mean?
ANSWER


Share:
Allah Ta'ala says, 'They (wives) are a covering for you and you (husbands)
are a covering for them (wives).' (Baqarah)

The headscarf is an indication of dignity and honour for you.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
